thread.title: Hartford Riverfront Recapture's Big Mo' 2015
thread.title_full: Hartford Riverfront Recapture's Big Mo' 2015 - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Hartford Riverfront Recapture's Big Mo' 2015
text:
Caption Big Mo' 2015 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries Caption Big Mo' 2015 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries The Hartford Riverfront Recapture held its annual fundraiser, the Big Mo', Saturday evening, Oct. 3, at the newly completed Front Street Lofts in Hartford. The building will be welcoming tentants to their apartments in the coming week. Guests of the event where able to tour studio, one bedroom and two bedrrom model versions of the apartments and take in the view of Hartford from the top floor.
Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant This photo gallery is featured in these articles: Features 'Big Mo' Riverfront Recapture Party Offers Sneak Peek At New Front Street Lofts
